## sopstool add

add file to the encryption list

### Synopsis


Add files to the list of files managed by sopstool

```
sopstool add [files ...] [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help         help for add
  -n, --no-encrypt   Do not encrypt the file after adding
```

